pupilLine.name: Eye line
pupilLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the centers of the eyes.

noseLine.name: Nose line
noseLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the outer edge of each nostril.

mouthLine.name: Mouth line
mouthLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the left edge of the mouth to the right edge of the mouth.

chinLine.name: Chin line
chinLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that represents the bottom of the chin.

cheekboneLine.name: Cheekbone line
cheekboneLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the tops of the cheekbones.

browLine.name: Brow line
browLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the centers of the eyebrows.

upperChin.name: Upper chin
upperChin.description: Draw a line from left to right that represents the top of the chin under the lips.

upperLip.name: Upper lip
upperLip.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the peaks of the upper lip.

topBridge.name: Top symmetry
topBridge.description: Draw a line from the top center of the forehead to the bridge of the nose.

outerEyes.name: Outer corners of eyes
outerEyes.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the outer corners of the eyes.

innerEyes.name: Inner corners of eyes
innerEyes.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the inner corners (tear ducts) of the eyes.

leftEyeBisection.name: Left eye bisect
leftEyeBisection.description: Draw a line from top to bottom that bisects the left eye.

rightEyeBisection.name: Right eye bisect
rightEyeBisection.description: Draw a line from top to bottom that bisects the right eye.

foreheadLine.name: Forehead line
foreheadLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that connects the middle of the forehead above the eyebrows.

jawLine.name: Jaw line
jawLine.description: Draw a line from left to right that represents the bottom of the jaw at the outside of the face.

silhouette.name: Silhouette
silhouette.description: Starting at the top of the forehead and going clockwise, outline the face.
